# Applying for Research Funding  {-}

If you are preparing to apply for research funding from a funding agency we invite you to consider the following.

- Being explicit about the proposed positive impact or legacy of the proposed project in the Bahamas as part of any impact or legacy statement required in the application.
- Identifying the amount and percentage of the project budget that will be expended in the Bahamas
- Joint ownership or control of intellectual property arising from the research. The Government of the Bahamas retains
